Django-Xero
===========

`Xero <https://xero.com>`_ integration for Django.

This package allows users to authenticate to Xero via a Public App that you have
registered on the `Xero Developer Portal <https://developer.xero.com>`_.

..  toctree::
    :maxdepth: 1
    :caption: Contents:

    quickstart
    requirements
    install
    module
    license
    issues
